message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $8,000 for it. Would you consider reducing the price?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob.  However, the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer. Could you consider $12,000? This is the lowest I'm willing to go.
I've considered your latest offer, Alice, but unfortunately, I still can't meet the price of $12,000. My maximum budget remains at $8,000. Would you be willing to negotiate further?
